abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Clippers Vice President of Basketball Operations Elgin Baylor said.

sentences.english: "It's about avoiding the expensive mistakes, " Elgin says.
